title: Game Scoop Episode 628
description: Welcome back to IGN Game Scoop!, the ONLY video game podcast! This week your Omega Cops -- Daemon Hatfield, Justin Davis, Sam Claiborn, and Mark Medina -- are discussing topics like God of War 2, the big games of 2022, the big games of 1998, and more. And, of course, they play Video Game 20 Questions. The music in this episode is from Blazing Lasers on TurboGrafx-16.
author: dan_parkhurst@ign.com (IGN)
